column1: Kata Robata////A total disappointment. The menu looked SO good
column2: but failed to deliver. I sent back two cocktails for being undrinkably unbalanced and they still charged us for one. Plus
column3: we tried five dishes and none of them were very good. Not bad
column4: but not good. What a waste of a dinner
column5: especially because it was my birthday. We wanted to have the outstanding chef's tasting we had there two years ago
column6: but they don't do it any more. Maybe it was so disappointing because we went on a Monday night Â instead of a Saturday night???
